Published November 19 2014

Website lists thousands of lives feeds to baby monitors, webcams

Website lists thousands of lives feeds to baby monitors, webcams — If you use a baby monitor or standalone webcam (not the one in your laptop) that connects to the internet, make sure you change the default password or disable the live streaming settings. Scary stuff.

Enjoy your day.
